header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitleHtml: Polished design, effortless updates, and SEO foundationsâ€”ready for any language.

faqs.answer: Clickeen is something that will make Margherita very very rich and alkways works.
faqs.question: What is Clickeen?

faqs.answer: Yes, one active widget with core features.
faqs.question: Is there a free plan?

faqs.answer: Copy the embed code and paste it before </body> on your site.
faqs.question: How do I install a widget?

faqs.answer: Because Clickeen is an amazing new platform to make the web beautiful and easy to use.
faqs.question: Why should I use Clickeen

html: <bob-panel id='content'>
@slot:header-content
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-content-sections group-label='' class='diet-object-manager' type='object-manager' path='sections' add-label='Add section' reorder-label='Manage sections' reorder-title='Manage sections' label-path='title' index-token='__SECTION__' default-item='{"title":"All Questions","faqs":[{"question":"New question","answer":"New answer","defaultOpen":false}]}' template='<tooldrawer-field type="repeater" path="sections.__SECTION__.faqs" label="Questions" label-key="faq.item" label-params="{&quot;count&quot;:2}" add-label="Add question" add-label-key="faq.actions.addItem" add-label-params="{&quot;item&quot;:{&quot;$t&quot;:&quot;faq.item&quot;,&quot;count&quot;:1}}" labelPath="sections.__SECTION__.title" labelInputLabel="Section" labelPlaceholder="All Questions" labelSize="lg" default-item="{&quot;question&quot;:&quot;New question&quot;,&quot;answer&quot;:&quot;New answer&quot;,&quot;defaultOpen&quot;:false}" template='<div class="diet-repeater__item-body"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit diet-popover-host" data-allow-links="false" data-size="md" data-state="closed"><div class="diet-dropdown-header diet-dropdown-edit__control" role="button" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-expanded="false"><span class="diet-dropdown-header-label label-s">Q:</span><span class="diet-dropdown-header-value body-s" data-muted="true" data-placeholder="Type your question">Type your question</span></div><div class="diet-popover" role="dialog" aria-label="Question"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">Q:</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="textformat.size.larger"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body diet-dropdown-edit__body"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__main"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__editor body-xsmall" contenteditable="true">Type your question</div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__palette"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__toolbarrow"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--format"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="bold"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="bold"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="italic"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="italic"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="underline"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="underline"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="strike"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="strikethrough"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="link"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="link"></span></button></div><span class="diet-dropdown-edit__divider is-hidden"></span><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--clear"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-format"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="arrow.counterclockwise"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-links"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="personalhotspot.slash"></span></button></div></div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__linksheet" aria-hidden="true"><div class="diet-popaddlink diet-popover" data-state="empty"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">Add URL</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger diet-popaddlink__close" data-size="xs" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="multiply"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body"><div class="diet-textfield" data-size="md"><label class="diet-textfield__control"><span class="diet-textfield__display-label label-s">URL:</span><input type="text" class="diet-textfield__field body-s diet-popaddlink__input" aria-label="URL" placeholder="https://example.com" /></label><span class="diet-textfield__helper caption diet-popaddlink__helper"></span></div><div class="diet-popaddlink__actions"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-txt diet-popaddlink__apply" data-size="md" data-variant="primary"><span class="diet-btn-txt__label">Apply</span></button></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><input type="hidden" class="diet-dropdown-edit__field" value="Type your question" data-bob-path="sections.__SECTION__.faqs.__INDEX__.question" /></div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit diet-popover-host" data-size="md" data-state="closed"><div class="diet-dropdown-header diet-dropdown-edit__control" role="button" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-expanded="false"><span class="diet-dropdown-header-label label-s">A:</span><span class="diet-dropdown-header-value body-s" data-muted="true" data-placeholder="Type your answer">Type your answer</span></div><div class="diet-popover" role="dialog" aria-label="Answer"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">A:</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="textformat.size.larger"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body diet-dropdown-edit__body"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__main"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__editor body-xsmall" contenteditable="true">Type your answer</div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__palette"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__toolbarrow"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--format"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="bold"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="bold"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="italic"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="italic"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="underline"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="underline"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="strike"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="strikethrough"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="link"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="link"></span></button></div><span class="diet-dropdown-edit__divider is-hidden"></span><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--clear"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-format"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="arrow.counterclockwise"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-links"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="personalhotspot.slash"></span></button></div></div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__linksheet" aria-hidden="true"><div class="diet-popaddlink diet-popover" data-state="empty"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">Add URL</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger diet-popaddlink__close" data-size="xs" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="multiply"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body"><div class="diet-textfield" data-size="md"><label class="diet-textfield__control"><span class="diet-textfield__display-label label-s">URL:</span><input type="text" class="diet-textfield__field body-s diet-popaddlink__input" aria-label="URL" placeholder="https://example.com" /></label><span class="diet-textfield__helper caption diet-popaddlink__helper"></span></div><div class="diet-popaddlink__actions"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-txt diet-popaddlink__apply" data-size="md" data-variant="primary"><span class="diet-btn-txt__label">Apply</span></button></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><input type="hidden" class="diet-dropdown-edit__field" value="Type your answer" data-bob-path="sections.__SECTION__.faqs.__INDEX__.answer" /></div></div>' />' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-title-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='displayCategoryTitles' label='Show section title' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='layout'>
@slot:header-layout
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-layout-choice group-label='' type='choice-tiles' size='md' path='layout.type' label='Layout' value='{{layout.type}}' options='[{"label":"Accordion","value":"accordion","icon":"chevron.down.2"},{"label":"List","value":"list","icon":"square.stack.3d.up"},{"label":"Cards","value":"multicolumn","icon":"circle.grid.2x2"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-type-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='layout.gap' label='Gap (px)' />
<tooldrawer-field-type-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandFirst' label='Open first question by default' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field-type-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.multiOpen' label='Allow multiple open' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field-type-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandAll' label='Expand all questions' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field-type-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='layout.columns.desktop' label='Columns (desktop)' show-if="layout.type == 'multicolumn'" />
<tooldrawer-field-type-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='layout.columns.mobile' label='Columns (mobile)' show-if="layout.type == 'multicolumn'" />

<tooldrawer-field-type-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='layout.cardsLayout' label='Cards layout' placeholder='Choose layout' value='{{layout.cardsLayout}}' show-if="layout.type == 'multicolumn'" options='[{"label":"Grid","value":"grid"},{"label":"Masonry","value":"masonry"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-item-padding group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingLinked' label='Link Q&A card padding' label-key='faq.labels.linkItemPadding' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{layout.itemPaddingLinked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-item-padding group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='layout.itemPadding' label='Q&A card padding (px)' label-key='faq.labels.itemPadding' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-item-padding group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingTop' label='Q&A card top padding (px)' label-key='faq.labels.itemPaddingTop' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-item-padding group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingRight' label='Q&A card right padding (px)' label-key='faq.labels.itemPaddingRight' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-item-padding group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingBottom' label='Q&A card bottom padding (px)' label-key='faq.labels.itemPaddingBottom' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-item-padding group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='layout.itemPaddingLeft' label='Q&A card left padding (px)' label-key='faq.labels.itemPaddingLeft' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' show-if="layout.itemPaddingLinked == false" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='appearance'>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-theme group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.theme' label='Theme' value='{{appearance.theme}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-accordion group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.iconStyle' label='Accordion icon' placeholder='Choose icon' value='{{appearance.iconStyle}}' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" options='[{"label":"Plus","value":"plus"},{"label":"Chevron","value":"chevron"},{"label":"Arrow One","value":"arrow"},{"label":"Arrow Two","value":"arrowshape"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-accordion group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.iconColor' label='Accordion icon color' value='{{appearance.iconColor}}' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
@slot:header-appearance
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Links' show-if="hasLinks(sections)">

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-links group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.linkStyle' label='Link style' value='{{appearance.linkStyle}}' options='[{"label":"Underline","value":"underline"},{"label":"Highlight","value":"highlight"},{"label":"Color","value":"color"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-links group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.linkUnderlineColor' label='Underline color' value='{{appearance.linkUnderlineColor}}' show-if="appearance.linkStyle == 'underline'" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-links group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.linkHighlightColor' label='Highlight color' value='{{appearance.linkHighlightColor}}' show-if="appearance.linkStyle == 'highlight'" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-links group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.linkTextColor' label='Link text color' value='{{appearance.linkTextColor}}' show-if="appearance.linkStyle == 'color'" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Q&A card'>

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Q&A card background' label-key='faq.labels.itemBackground' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked' label='Link Q&A card corners' label-key='faq.labels.linkItemCorners' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radius' label='Corner radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radius}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == true" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTL' label='Q&A card top-left radius' label-key='faq.labels.itemTopLeftRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTL}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTR' label='Q&A card top-right radius' label-key='faq.labels.itemTopRightRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTR}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBR' label='Q&A card bottom-right radius' label-key='faq.labels.itemBottomRightRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBR}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBL' label='Q&A card bottom-left radius' label-key='faq.labels.itemBottomLeftRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBL}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.border' label='Q&A card border' label-key='faq.labels.itemBorder' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.border}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.shadow' label='Q&A card outside shadow' label-key='faq.labels.itemOutsideShadow' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.shadow}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked' label='Link Q&A card inside shadows' label-key='faq.labels.linkItemInsideShadows' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.layer' label='Inside shadow layer' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.layer}}' options='[{"label":"Show below content","value":"below-content"},{"label":"Show above content","value":"above-content"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.all' label='Q&A card inside shadow' label-key='faq.labels.itemInsideShadow' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.all}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.top' label='Q&A card inside shadow (top)' label-key='faq.labels.itemInsideShadowTop' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.top}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.right' label='Q&A card inside shadow (right)' label-key='faq.labels.itemInsideShadowRight' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.right}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.bottom' label='Q&A card inside shadow (bottom)' label-key='faq.labels.itemInsideShadowBottom' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.bottom}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.left' label='Q&A card inside shadow (left)' label-key='faq.labels.itemInsideShadowLeft' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"faq.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.left}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == false" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Stage/Pod'>

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='stage.background' label='Stage background' value='{{stage.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='stage.shadow' label='Stage outside shadow' value='{{stage.shadow}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.linked' label='Link stage inside shadows' value='{{stage.insideShadow.linked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.layer' label='Inside shadow layer' value='{{stage.insideShadow.layer}}' options='[{"label":"Show below content","value":"below-content"},{"label":"Show above content","value":"above-content"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.all' label='Stage inside shadow' value='{{stage.insideShadow.all}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.top' label='Stage inside shadow (top)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.top}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.right' label='Stage inside shadow (right)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.right}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.bottom' label='Stage inside shadow (bottom)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.bottom}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.left' label='Stage inside shadow (left)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.left}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='pod.background' label='Pod background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.podBorder' label='Pod border' value='{{appearance.podBorder}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='pod.shadow' label='Pod outside shadow' value='{{pod.shadow}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.linked' label='Link pod inside shadows' value='{{pod.insideShadow.linked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.layer' label='Inside shadow layer' value='{{pod.insideShadow.layer}}' options='[{"label":"Show below content","value":"below-content"},{"label":"Show above content","value":"above-content"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.all' label='Pod inside shadow' value='{{pod.insideShadow.all}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.top' label='Pod inside shadow (top)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.top}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.right' label='Pod inside shadow (right)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.right}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.bottom' label='Pod inside shadow (bottom)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.bottom}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.left' label='Pod inside shadow (left)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.left}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='settings'>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='SEO/GEO'>
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo-toggle group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='seoGeo.enabled' label='Enable SEO/GEO optimization' />
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='seo.enableSchema' label='Enable schema' show-if="seoGeo.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo group-label='' type='textfield' size='lg' path='seo.canonicalUrl' label='Canonical URL' placeholder='https://example.com/page' show-if="seoGeo.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field-settings-geo group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='geo.enableDeepLinks' label='Enable deep links' show-if="seoGeo.enabled == true" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Clickeen Branding'>
<tooldrawer-field-settings-behavior group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show Made with Clickeen' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
